title: Wonderful one bedroom one bath home with one car garage parking
description: Wonderful one bedroom one bath home with one car garage parking and large private outdoor courtyard conveniently located within the Mid Century Modern Society Hill classic called Penn's Landing Square. Designed by the architect Louis Sauer in 1968 it is a full city block of impeccably maintained and planted courtyards with homes of all sizes. This gated community sits in the heart of Society Hill. Cobblestone clad streets, Head house Farmers Market (one half a block away and pretty amazing), Zahav restaurant, Stella Pizza, Malbec and many incredible independent coffee shops all within short walking distance. 9A is perfectly situated at the South West corner of the complex (closest to 2nd & Delancey where there is an additional courtyard entrance) and just off the complex's private in ground pool. This unit is 980 sq ft plus a 162 sq ft private garden. Enter through your own North West facing private gated landscaped courtyard/patio/garden to the front door. There is a generous coat closet on the left and then a wide open living /dining area all with engineered laminate floors. All windows look out on to your private garden. Larger main bedroom with walk in closet all with wall to wall carpeting. Updated full tiled bath with tub. Original eat in kitchen with pass through to living room and pantry closet. Stackable washer dryer in hall closet as well as a small storage room/additional closet.

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: Make your home in Fitler Sq! Phenomenal 3 bed 2 bath home!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available Now!
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

description:
1515 S Corlies St – Available September
Beautifully renovated 3 bedroom 1 bathroom home in the heart of the South Philly Point Breeze area. Close to public transit, highways, convenience stores, parks, grocery stores and more. This is a great convenient location for anyone.
The home itself is a 2 story single family home with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a full clean and dry basement. The main floor offers hardwood floors, tall ceilings, and good natural light. The kitchen is fantastic with all wood cabinets, granite counter tops and full size stainless steel appliances, simply beautiful. Through the kitchen is a door that leads to a private little deck perfect for a BBQ or dining outside. The basement is offers additional storage, a full size washer and dryer, and access to the rear small street which you can park a car outside of this house.
The 2nd floor offers 3 bedrooms and a gorgeous 3 piece tiled bathroom. A must see home!!

title: 2 bedroom renovated w/ central air near University City
description:
Two bedroom, one bath 2nd floor apartment on the 5300 block of Spruce Street near University City in West Philadelphia on border of 19143. Great block, located directly across from a church, so tons of street parking generally available. Steps to 42 bus and a short walk to 52nd street Market street El stop (blue line). Freshly painted and recently renovated with recessed lighting throughout, ceramic tile in bathroom and huge eat-in kitchen with granite, 3 windows and storage closet. $1150 per month, $3450 to move-in (1st, last and 1 month security).
Water is included, tenant responsible for electric, gas and cable/internet/phone, etc. If this ad is up, unit remains available. Section 8 not available at this time.

title: Graduate Hospital 3 Bedroom 2 Bath & Large Balcony Apartment
description:
Spacious Three Bedroom Luxury Apartment for Rent in Center City/Graduate Hospital/Rittenhouse in Philadelphia, PA. Please call directly. Call Phone Number listed in this posting:  show contact info
This Spacious Three Bedroom Apartment at 1640 South Street is on the 3rd Floor and has much natural lighting with Sky Light Windows on the ceilings. It is Three Bedrooms (One Master Bedroom, Two Regular Bedrooms), Two Full Bathrooms, Spacious Open Layout Living Room and Dining Area, Large Balcony/Deck, Kitchen, Dishwasher, Dryer and Washer Units, Central Air, High Quality Wood Hardwood Flooring, and more. This apartment is in a prime and centrally located area in the beautiful and trendy neighborhood of Center City Philadelphia, west of Broad Street (also known as the ever popular "Graduate Hospital" area of the city). It is a walker's paradise and is in walkable distance to Rittenhouse Square Park, Center City designer shopping, Liberty Place Mall, five star restaurants, and supermarket/grocers. Just blocks away from Broad Street "Avenue of the Arts" Theaters & Performing Arts Venues and Philadelphia's City Hall. It is truly in the Heart of Philadelphia.
Along this South Street corridor are a mix of restaurants, eateries, coffee shops, dry cleaners, fitness studio, convenience stores, and other local businesses. Pediatrician office (Center City Pediatrics) is situated one block down. A beautiful playground/park for recreation is just a two block walk south. The renowned Children's Hospital of Philadelphia and Hospitals in the University of Pennsylvania network is just a mere 7 minute drive west to University City where you can find University of Pennsylvania and Drexel University among other institutions. This is one of the most desired locations in Philadelphia to live and is extremely commuter-friendly, family-friendly, and a trendy area for working professionals, couples, and individuals of all backgrounds who love to live and work within a vibrant and lively area while still having a residential feel in a peaceful neighborhood with nearby parks/green spaces. It is right by SEPTA Broad Street Line (Lombard-South station), and connecting SEPTA bus lines.
1640 South Street Apt #3F Philadelphia, PA 19146 Rent $2899 Please call directly if you have any questions and would like to schedule a viewing. Call Phone Number listed in this posting:  show contact info

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Giant Heirloom Market, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, and Reading Terminal Market. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, or Alchemy. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
